en.title: FusionExcel Sponsors Perwira K9 Team RM 15,000 to Represent Malaysia in the International Wheelchair Basketball Competition , Pattaya, Thailand!
en.content:
FusionExcel is proud to announce the sponsorship of the Perwira K9 Basketball Team who will be representing Malaysia in the International Wheelchair Basketball Competition in Pattaya, Thailand, from 20th August 2008 till 24th August 2008. In 2008,The Perwira K9 Team won the Selangor Wheelchair Basketball Championship, the Malaysia League Wheelchair Basketball and the Wheelchair Basketball Malaysia Paralympics Games.

Attending the mock cheque ceremony was Mr Chong Tuck Meng, Founder, Advisor and Coach of Perwira K9, Dr Ang Kean Koo, Honorable Secretary General of the Malaysia Wheelchair Basketball Federation, Paul Ting, Founder CEO of Fusion Excel and KS Lee Founder Director of Fusion Excel.

During the ceremony FusionExcel also presented each of the Team members with a Quantum Flask. The Perwira K9 Team are already wearers of FusionExcel's Quantum Pendant. All the Team members gave very positive testimonials of FusionExcel's Quantum Pendant at the ceremony.

FusionExcel wishes the Perwira K9 Team SUCCESS in Pattaya!
